attributes.action: explain why offenders who are convicted of shoplifting face a fine of GBP80.00p; drivers who are convicted of speeding are fined an average of GBP60.00p yet residents who place their bins out a day early, thereby creating absolutely no danger to the public or the environment, are liable to be fined GBP100.00p.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are daily reports of the ludicrous way our judiciary is developing with regard to sentencing with complete disregard for the public view.  It is time that Mr Bliar made a public announcement - live in the House of Commons - to explain why is it cheaper to steal other people's property and endanger pedestrians and other road users by speeding, than it is to put your rubbish bin out the night before it is due to be collected the following morning.
